name: Full Stack software developer
description: Build complete web apps from front end to back end: design REST APIs, wire up databases, and ship responsive UIs. YouA��,��,�ll practice modern tooling, deployment, and teamwork to deliver production-ready features.

modules.name: Frontend Foundations
modules.description: Set up tooling and build production-ready UIs with components, routing, and state.

lessons.name: Project Setup & Tooling
lessons.description: Initialize the app, configure scripts, and establish a clean project structure.

lessons.name: Components, Props & State
lessons.description: Create reusable components and manage interactive state and events.

lessons.name: Routing & Data Fetching
lessons.description: Navigate between screens and load data from APIs.

modules.name: Backend & APIs
modules.description: Design REST endpoints, connect databases, and integrate the frontend with services.

lessons.name: REST API Design
lessons.description: Plan routes, resources, and payload shapes for robust services.

lessons.name: Persistence Layer
lessons.description: Model data and implement CRUD with a database.

lessons.name: Auth & Deployment
lessons.description: Add authentication and ship your app to production.

modules.name: Capstone Project
modules.description: Scope, build, and present a capstone that integrates course skills.

lessons.name: Review & Planning
lessons.description: Set scope, outcomes, and success criteria.

lessons.name: Build & Iterate
lessons.description: Implement features, collect feedback, and refine.

lessons.name: Demo & Reflection
lessons.description: Present work, discuss trade-offs, and next steps.

name: Intro to Python

name: Intro to CPP
description: Explore C++ basics including types, control flow, functions, classes, and the STL. Lab work emphasizes performance, memory management, and writing clean, idiomatic C++.

lessons.description: Compile, link, and run C++ programs; understand the build flow.

lessons.name: Pointers & References
lessons.description: Understand memory semantics and parameter passing.

lessons.name: Classes & Inheritance
lessons.description: Design classes, apply inheritance and encapsulation.

lessons.name: RAII & Resource Safety
lessons.description: Manage resources and avoid leaks with RAII.

name: Intro to swift
description: Start building with Swift: language basics, optionals, structs vs. classes, and protocols. Projects focus on writing safe, modern code ready for iOS/macOS development.

modules.description: Master Swift syntax, optionals, and value vs reference types.
